name: Supereviltwins
description:
You are stuck in a villain's fortress and when you find him you discover that his twin is in the castle. And he is even more evil.
Luckily you know how to control the time and rewind it. Jump back in time, find the Superevil Twin and win the game.

Submission for Brackeys Jam 2020.2

Controls

E - Attack
Space - Jump
WASD / Arrows - Choose path

3TP Games crew

Coding - TakFog
2D Art - Marco Righi
3D, Animation, SFX & Music - B-Keeper
